info.name: Twitter: Show Original Codepoint Markers
info.description:
Shows places where Twitter removed codepoints in pink.
This detects for example users suffering from the recent iPhone 'I�'¹ bug, which Twitter mitigated.

¹For safe demonstration purposes, this description contains U+FFFD (REPLACEMENT CHARACTER), not U+FE0F (VARIATION SELECTOR-16) from the real bug.
